name: Ramada Sibiu

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We loved the Ramada in Sibiu. It was positioned just a short walk across a park to the Historic centre. We were able to park securely on site (small charge) but it was reassuring that the hire car was safe. We were upgraded to a gorgeous suite on the 13th floor without asking. The suite had a duel aspect full floor to ceiling view over the park, historic town, and the mountains. I have stayed in some lovely rooms but the views from this suite were just amazing. We had two bathrooms, a lovely bedroom (again with views over the town) and a sitting/dining area all with great facilities including 2 large flat screen TVs. I had read other reviews mentioning stained carpets, but I can assure you that the condition of our rooms were 100% The hotel is modern, and well serviced. The staff were very polite. Breakfast was a full buffet selection, and very tasty. The scenic lift took you to your floor, the ground floor, the gym floor and the restaurant. 100% Ramada Sibiu. Thank you.
reviews.title: Perfect end to our holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We tried to book a room at the Hilton but they would not accept dogs. Ramada offered us an apartment for 3 people and 2 dogs for which we payed 6 eur per dog extra. The apartment was large, with two bathrooms and a kitchenette, very clean and comfortable. I had breakfast brought to my room and it was delivered by a friendly waiter and it was also fresh and tasty. A very positive experience. Very polite and helpful staff. Honest prices.
reviews.title: Superb hotel

description: Ramada Sibiu Hotel****, officially opened in 12th of June 2007, is ideally located right in the medieval city center and close to the local business media. It offers you high quality services for business trips and special like events or functions, in a discreet and hospitable surrounding.
